typeDescriptions.typeString: function (address,address payable,uint256,string memory,uint8,string memory,bool,address payable) returns (contract DestructibleMiniMeToken)

nodes.name: createDestructibleCloneToken

params._decimalUnits: Number of decimals of the new token
params._parentToken: Address of the token being cloned
params._snapshotBlock: Block of the parent token that will  determine the initial distribution of the clone token
params._tokenSymbol: Token Symbol for the new token
params._transfersEnabled: If true, tokens will be able to be transferred

createDestructibleCloneToken(address,uin.return: The address of the new token contract

createDestructibleCloneToken(address,uin.notice: Update the DApp by creating a new token with new functionalities  the msg.sender becomes the controller of this clone token
